full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,
Atarix (our IT team) has advised that while Curtis delegated the ability to manage the DNS entries to them, he unfortunately did not delegate full account authority. I have set up a support ticket - Ticket ID 2852763.


Could you please email any required updates to support@atarix.com.au and quote the ticket number (or reply all to this message). If it's necessary (or simpler) to speak to them directly, let me know and I'll source the best contact.


Thank-you.


Lori Hoffmann
Marketing and Communications




T 02 9925 7222 D 02 9925 7204
M GPO Box 445 Sydney NSW 2001
O Grosvenor Place, Level 32, Suite 7, 225 George Stret, Sydney NSW 2000
W www.genesisfp.com.au
